items.preText:
All set for the chase. Shahzad to take strike. Mortaza has the ball

MahneelMusa: "Taken in the squad as a finisher and he doesn't only finish but also rebuilds the innings when all hopes are lost. Mahmudullah Riyad the true silent guardian of Bangladesh cricket"



M Sai Kiran M: "Both the matches are equally interesting.Looking at how Afghanistan chases Bangladesh defending score and Pakistan defending their score of 236 against India considering their underwhelming last 10 overs of batting that fetched them only 68 runs out of which 22 came in a single over of Bhuvi. Much awaited chases and it keeps becoming more interesting."
items.text: loud shout first up but going down leg. Comes back into Shahzad and hits him on the pads
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: smacked short ball, sat up to be hit and Shahzad was on to it in a flash. Swivelled to pull it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: walks down the track and adjusts. length ball on the pads and he flicks it off his hips past the short fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: strays down legside for a wide. Mortaza under pressure immediately
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 wide

items.text: length ball on the stumps, patted down to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, defended to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, defended with the full face of the bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.preText:
ShakiBd: "Imrul kayes should be another Tamim Iqbal if he got opportunity to open for Bangladesh. But most time he was out of BCB eye, don't know why."

NISHANT : "To everyone asking why Imrul Kayes is not in BD ODI side is because even after playing 70 ODI matches he averages below 30 with a SR of 68...which in today's world is extremely subpar.. Have been innings where he just spent time and not able to push on!! "
items.text: fullish on the pads, he tries to turn it away but doesn't get enough bat on it
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: given some air, but on the pads again, tuned to short fine-leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: stays round the wicket and angling into the pads
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: gets some bat on it this time, but again to short fine leg.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: goes straight back down the ground and over the bowler for four. He had enough of that on the pads line so stepped out and took matters into his own hands
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, FOUR runs

items.text: full ball on the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: length ball, tried to cut it from the stumps. Only goes as far as cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length outside off, he nudges it to third man. Not much footwork from Shahzad
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: angles it into the batsman, who tries to tuck it off his hips but can't connect
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: strays too far down, and pays the penalty. Nicely flicked off his pads and into the fine-leg fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ihsanullah, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, he stands and punches, but straight to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he tries to drag it over mid-on but only toe-ends it into the legside
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ihsanullah, no run

items.text: comes forward to defend this full ball, it rolls off the inside edge from in front of his pads to short fine leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: dropped Mohammad Mithun shells the chance running back from mid-on. Shahzad came down the track to go over the top, but got only the toe end of the bat. Mithun didn't judge it at all, and the ball ends up hitting his head. Adding injury to insult
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 2 runs

items.text: defended to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: flatter outside off, tries to chop it away but underedges it
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: drifts in a bit on leg stump and the batsman tentatively defends
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: goes back to punch it to mid-on with a horizontal bat. Quicker one
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run
